attributes.action: provide tax relief or cut fuel duty for all people living and trying to carry on working in Cumbria following the floods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please provide us with a cut in fuel duty. We are currently paying £1.10 per litre of unleaded and it is steadily rising. Following the collapse of local infrastruture many people are now finding themselves with long commutes to and from work. The knock on effect of this is the cost of filling cars up.People living and working in this rural area depend on their cars at the best of times, now it's even more expensive. Public transport is pretty poor and unreliable, so please provide help to motorists.
